headline: Saints Women sign second ex-Sheffield United player
summary: Southampton have signed goalkeeper Fran Stenson from Sheffield United, following Tara Bourne’s transfer earlier this week.  An England youth international from U-17s to U-23s, the 23-year-old has been on the books of Birmingham City, Manchester […]

headline: Gracie Pearse goes back to Charlton Women in permanent deal
summary: Charlton Athletic have signed defender Gracie Pearse on a permanent contract following a loan spell from Tottenham Hotspur. She joined the Addicks in December last year, making four appearances for the Championship title-chasers before the […]

headline: Brighton Women sign ex-Rangers defender Rachel McLauchlan
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion have signed Scotland international defender Rachel McLauchlan from SWPL side Rangers. The 27-year-old spent three seasons with Rangers, winning a cup double with them last term and the league title in […]

headline: Barclays WSL & Championship Summer 2024 Transfer Watch
summary: Keep track of all the 2024 summer transfer window moves involving Barclays WSL and Women’s Championship players with our regularly updated list. Although the WSL transfer window remains open from 24 June through to 13 […]

headline: Newcastle United Women add experienced defender Demi Stokes
summary: Championship newcomers Newcastle United’s latest signing is England veteran and former Man City player Demi Stokes. The 32-year-old has 69 caps for the Lionesses and spent the last nine years with Manchester City, winning nine […]

headline: Durham sign striker Carly Johns
summary: Durham have signed 21-year-old prolific striker Carly Johns, formerly of Watford, on a professional contract. She scored nine times in all competitions last season for the relegated Hornets, earlier netting 52 goals in 76 appearances […]

headline: A-League winner Dario Vidošić joins Brighton Women as head coach
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion’s new head coach is Dario Vidošić, who led Melbourne City to the A-league title last season. The 37-year-old has agreed a contract until 2027 and will be assisted by Chris Roberts, […]

headline: Aston Villa Women sign Spanish international Paula Tomás
summary: Aston Villa sign Spanish international defender Paula Tomás from Levante on a two-year deal, with the option of a further year. The 22-year-old left-back played over 75 times for the Spanish top-flight side, while at […]

headline: City Ground home for Nottingham Forest Women in full-time move
summary: Third-tier Nottingham Forest Women are to play all home league games at The City Ground ahead of turning professional for the 2025/26 season. Forest finished third in the FAWNL Northern Premier Division last season and […]

headline: Southampton FC Women sign England U-23 defender Tara Bourne
summary: Southampton FC Women have signed 20-year-old centre-back Tara Bourne following her departure from Sheffield United. She played 17 times for the Blades last season and has already made well-over 50 senior appearances, having had spells […]
